name: ASOMATUS Ch.0 - SPROUT-IN-STONE
description:
In this short game you will explore the home of an odd gardener and his plant. Explore your home. Meet the ones who live in the Library. Have an audience at the King's Court.

---

Use the Arrow Keys to move around.

Use Z, Space or Enter to Confirm or Interact.

Use X to Cancel.

Use ESC to open the Menu when it is available.

---

CONTENT WARNINGS

- Overall themes of loss

- General sense of dread and/or foreboding

Please make sure you're doing well before playing, okay?


A Message from the developer

This is my first game.

I made it mainly to see if I could put together a complete product from nothing.

As a result, most of it is improvised and not very well planned or written.

The quality may not be very good, and the story may not be very interesting.

I hope you can enjoy it regardless.

Programs used & Special Thanks

This game was made using RPG Maker MV.

All music was composed using LMMS and FL Studio.

All visuals were created using aseprite and paint.NET.

The majority of sound effects were created using bfxr and ChipTone.

Some audio has been edited using Audacity.

Special Thanks to:

- Anteprefix and quietforte, for beta testing & valuable feedback
- andromalin, for all the advice & support
